en-US.title: Comment
en-US.subtitle: Comment - Display comments in the Directus Activity Collection
en-US.description: Display comments in the Directus Activity Collection
disclaimer: All comments are displayed by date in a descending order...
Only a maximum of 200 comments are returned.
NOTE: You may not have access to all the collections displayed.
To view or respond to a comment, click on the row to navigate to the collection or item.
To edit a comment, double click or tap on the comment and begin typing...

empty: There are currently no comments available or comments have been deleted!
You must have access to the Directus Activity Collection to view or add comments!

reply.hint: Enter the reply to the comment and click the submit button to send.
